name: InstallMATLAB
description: Install MATLAB on a Linux-based Microsoft-hosted agent. Currently, this task is available only for public projects and does not include transformation products, such as MATLAB Coder and MATLAB Compiler.
author: The MathWorks, Inc.

inputs.name: release
inputs.label: Release
inputs.helpMarkDown: MATLAB release to install. You can specify R2020a or a later release. If you do not specify `release`, the task installs the latest release of MATLAB.

inputs.name: products
inputs.label: Products
inputs.helpMarkDown: A space-separated list of MathWorks products to install.

messages.InstallNotSupportedOnSelfHosted: Install MATLAB task is not supported on self-hosted agents. To install MATLAB on this machine, use the standard installer.

messages.FailedToAddToPath: Failed to add MATLAB to system path: %s
